Game: Zorro- Quest for Justice Zorro to the Rescue! Villains beware! The masked adventurer Zorro returns in this legendary adventure on Nintendo DS. Vanqish evil-doers with your razor -sharp sword and lightning wit! Features •Unique Fighting System – Use combos to combat Bandits, Pirates and Captain Esteban• 8 Levels – From a Spanish Garrison to the Devil’s Fortress• Multiple Weapons – Use a whip, rapier and other deadly weapons <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/c5e7bf09-825c-439d-8850-fcb031f6f805.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/3a0330d0-b70f-487d-b754-6f83da3d3d60.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/fc9ea1a0-0d08-4da1-b8dd-cdbbfcf84493.png
